Biograph Of Ahmed Tejan

Name and Qualifications

My name is Ahmed Tejan, a 21 years old. Curently a Second Year Electrical and Electronics Student at the Fourah Bay college.

Family

A family of four (4). Dad is a Government Worker as well as my Mom. I have a sister and she is the eldest of us all. I am the second born and First male born. The second male born is fourteen years old and the last of us is also a male and he is two years old abd some months.
